login.insert-info: Please log in with your email and password
login.login-error-msg: Email or password are not valid. Please try again.

signup.name: Name
signup.password-instructions: Password must contain one capital letter, one number and one special character.
signup.signup-error-msg: Email or password not valid. Please make sure password meet the requirements.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which porofessor.gg collects, uses, maintains and discloses information collected from users (each, a "User") of the http://ohlol.gg website ("Site")
privacy.personal-text: Personal identification information We may collect personal identification information from Users in a variety of ways in connection with activities, services, features or resources we make available on our Site. . Users may visit our Site anonymously. We will collect personal identification information from Users only if they voluntarily submit such information to us. Users can always refuse to supply personally identification information, except that it may prevent them from engaging in certain Site related activities.
privacy.howeuse-text: We may collect and use Users personal information for the following purposes:
privacy.howeuse-1: Display content on the Site correctly.
privacy.howeuse-3: To improve our Site We may use feedback you provide
privacy.contact-text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, the practices of this site, or your dealings with this site, please contact us. This document was last updated on March 31rd, 2022
